key.name: active
key.description: Whether this plugin would be activated by gnome-settings-daemon or not

key.name: priority
key.summary: Priority to use for this plugin
key.description: Priority to use for this plugin in gnome-settings-daemon startup queue

key.name: connection-use-mobile
key.description: Use mobile broadband connections such as GSM and CDMA to check for updates.

key.name: auto-download-updates
key.summary: Automatically download updates in the background without confirmation
key.description: Automatically download updates in the background without confirmation. Updates will be auto-downloaded when using wired network connnections, and mobile broadband if 'connection-use-mobile' is enabled.

key.name: frequency-get-updates
key.summary: How often to check for updates
key.description: How often to check for updates. Value is in seconds. This is a maximum amount of time that can pass between a security update being published, and the update being automatically installed or the user notified.

key.name: frequency-updates-notification
key.summary: How often to notify the user that non-critical updates are available
key.description: How often to tell the user there are non-critical updates. Value is in seconds. Security update notifications are always shown after the check for updates, but non-critical notifications should be shown a lot less frequently.

key.name: last-updates-notification
key.summary: The last time we told the user about non-critical notifications
key.description: The last time we notified the user about non-critical updates. Value is in seconds since the epoch, or zero for never.

key.name: frequency-get-upgrades
key.summary: How often to check for distribution upgrades
key.description: How often to check for distribution upgrades. Value is in seconds.

key.name: frequency-refresh-cache
key.summary: How often to refresh the package cache
key.description: How often to refresh the package cache. Value is in seconds.

key.name: update-battery
key.summary: Check for updates when running on battery power
key.description: Check for updates when running on battery power.

key.name: notify-distro-upgrades
key.summary: Notify the user when distribution upgrades are available
key.description: Notify the user when distribution upgrades are available.

key.name: enable-check-firmware
key.summary: Ask the user if additional firmware should be installed
key.description: Ask the user if additional firmware should be installed if it is available.

key.name: banned-firmware
key.summary: Firmware files that should not be searched for
key.description: Firmware files that should not be searched for, separated by commas. These can include '*' and '?' characters.

key.name: ignored-devices
key.description: Devices that should be ignored, separated by commas. These can include '*' and '?' characters.

key.name: media-repo-filenames
key.summary: The filenames on removable media that designate it a software source.
key.description: When removable media is inserted, it is checked to see if it contains any important filenames in the root directory. If the filename matches, then an updates check is performed. This allows post-install disks to be used to update running systems.
